performance and how do you maximize performance by minimizing the amount of rendering that you do okay so uh let's
say a change has occurred okay well uh we could just render the entire tree of
components okay uh but that would be very very bad for performance yeah so in any framework uh you need to be smart
about it okay so compose is very good at avoiding unnecessary work okay so
compose tries very hard to avoid calling composable functions okay so whenever
we're doing a recomposition if it can skip a call to a function it'll do it so
